course.title: CSI 5387 Data Mining and Concept Learning (3 units)
course.desc: Concepts and techniques of data mining. Methods for data summarization and data preprocessing. Algorithms for finding frequent patterns and association analysis; classification; cluster analysis and anomaly detection. Model selection, model evaluation and statistical significance testing. Approaches for coping with Big Data. Selected applications of data mining and concept learning.Course Component: LecturePermission of the Department is required.
